rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area with modern decor and natural lighting. Designed for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, suitable for family meals with an open layout.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated into the living area, wheelchair accessible with barrier-free design.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom ensuring privacy and accessibility.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom with Vastu-compliant orientation for energy flow.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for flexibility and future adaptation; wheelchair accessible if needed.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet space dedicated to reading and study, with shelves and comfortable seating.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Compact living area for household staff designed as per local norms; includes a small kitchenette and bathroom.

rooms.name: Two-Car Garage
rooms.description: Garage accommodating two vehicles with easy access to the main house.

openings.description: Large window to enhance natural light.
